solution.text:
When the triangle is revolved about side \(_{k}_\) cm, a cone is formed with base radius \(_{k}_\) cm and height \(_{j}_\) cm.
Radiius, r\(=_{k}_\,cm\)
Height, h\(=_{j}_\,cm\)
Volume of the cone\(=\frac13 \pi r^2h\)
\(=\frac13 \pi \times _{k}_^2 \times _{j}_\)
\(=_{{trunc(((1/Decimal(3))*pi_val*k**2*j),3)}}_\,cm^3\)

content.text: If the triangle is revolved about side \(_{k}_\)cm, find the volume of the solid formed.
